course_title: Advanced Nursing Practice for Practice Scholars
course_description: This is an elective course for the post-masters DNP students to obtain specialty knowledge in one aspect of advanced nursing practice (specialty clinical practice, policy and advocacy, education and teaching, research, leadership or consultation); this is a clinical course with clinical hours.
sections: Class Nbr: 3125, Section #: 1, Type: PRA, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Staebler, Status: Open
